cards.name: Famine
cards.description: A terrible drought has struck the land, causing crops to fail and livestock to perish.

cards.name: Prosperity
cards.description: The harvest is bountiful and trade flourishes, bringing wealth to all.

cards.name: Plague
cards.description: A mysterious disease spreads through the population, causing widespread panic.

cards.name: Festival
cards.description: The people celebrate with grand festivities, music, and dancing in the streets.

cards.name: Earthquake
cards.description: The ground shakes violently, toppling buildings and creating deep cracks in the earth.

cards.name: Solar Eclipse
cards.description: The sun is blotted out by the moon, casting an eerie darkness over the land.

cards.name: Meteor Shower
cards.description: Brilliant streaks of light fall from the heavens, inspiring awe and wonder.

cards.name: Volcanic Eruption
cards.description: A dormant volcano awakens, spewing ash and molten rock into the sky.

cards.name: Golden Age
cards.description: An era of unprecedented peace, learning, and artistic achievement begins.

cards.name: Wild Hunt
cards.description: Mystical hunters ride through the night sky, their howls echoing across the land.

cards.name: Great Storm
cards.description: Fierce winds and torrential rains lash the countryside for days on end.

cards.name: Discovery
cards.description: Ancient ruins are uncovered, revealing lost knowledge and forgotten treasures.

cards.name: Rebellion
cards.description: The oppressed rise up against their rulers, demanding freedom and justice.

cards.name: Divine Blessing
cards.description: The gods smile upon the land, bestowing their favor and protection.

cards.name: Invasion
cards.description: Foreign armies march across the borders, bringing war and conquest.

cards.name: Magic Surge
cards.description: The arcane energies of the world grow stronger, enabling great feats of magic.

cards.name: Great Migration
cards.description: Vast herds of animals or groups of people move across the land seeking new homes.

cards.name: Cursed Night
cards.description: Dark magic fills the air, causing nightmares and strange transformations.

cards.name: Renaissance
cards.description: A flowering of art, science, and culture spreads throughout the realm.

cards.name: Time Anomaly
cards.description: The flow of time becomes unstable, causing past and future to blur together.
